Title: ComputerTalk ice Contact Center demo for chatbot and live chat | ODSP1482
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Experience how ice Contact Center enables seamless customer interactions through live chat. See how messages are exchanged in real time as the bot and agent respond to the customer's questions and help resolve their request. This demo features a seamless handoff between the bot and agent and highlights how ice Contact Center supports quick, simple, and effective communication through its built-in chat feature.
